reference.title: cxxFunctionDefinition
reference.shortdesc: Describes all of the details of a C++ function declaration.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxFunctionDefinition> element describes all of the detail of a C++ function declaration including the function type, parameter declarations and const-volatile specifier. It also contains information about accessibilty, virtualness and so on.
The content model reflects the underlying complexity of C++ function declarations.
